alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Claiborne; Lincoln; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 2:26AM CDT until June 16 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Union Parish in north central Louisiana... Southern Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northeastern Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Lincoln Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 315 AM CDT. * At 226 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gibsland, or 12 miles east of Minden, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ruston, Grambling, Arcadia, Gibsland, Dubach, Choudrant, Simsboro, Vienna, Athens, Downsville, Mount Lebanon, D Arbonne, Mount Zion, Aycock, Spring Lake, Bayou D Arbonne Lake, Lake Clairborne, Corinth, Unionville and Ada. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
